What follows is an example for the WizardFramework library. It goes through a brief quiz on children\'s entertainment to demonstrate styling, state transitions, and other aspects of using the wizard generator.

Should you happen to be a developer the code for this project contains commented examples of how to use the framework to build a wizard.

This state demonstrates how to do background validations.

  • Click the button to enable the next button.
  • Slide the slider to determine how long you want the process to take.
  • Check the box if you want validation to succeed and jump to the next step.
